description: The actor was best known for playing the bounty hunter Boba Fett in the original trilogy.
title: Star Wars' Boba Fett actor Jeremy Bulloch dies aged 75
title_page: Star Wars' Boba Fett actor Jeremy Bulloch dies aged 75 - BBC News
maintext: "He will be remembered not only for his iconic portrayal of the legendary character, but also for his warmth and generous spirit which have become an enduring part of his rich legacy," the post said.
